name: Shallow Lake Falls: The SkinWalker Training Course (Demo)
name_original: Shallow Lake Falls: The SkinWalker Training Course (Demo)
description:
W,A,S,D To Move

Use the mouse to select the objects on the table.

You're a young boy living in Shallow Lake Falls. A nice urban area, with a twisted secret. The citywide curfew is 8 PM, and every remaining citizen knows why. Skinwalkers roam the streets. They have been for decades. Some say the population is decreasing, while others fear they're still walking among us all. Hiding in plain sight...
